name: live-pug-compiler
description: Compile Pug to HTML at realtime with live browser reload.

livePugCompiler.savePath.title: Save Path
livePugCompiler.savePath.description:
The path to which the compiled HTML files will be saved.
 / refers to the workspace root.

livePugCompiler.saveExt.title: Files extension
livePugCompiler.saveExt.description: Extension of compiled files. HTML, PHP or Other. Default is html files.

livePugCompiler.uScoreCompile.title: Вспомогательные файлы
livePugCompiler.uScoreCompile.description: Compile with underscore on begin filename. Default is not compile.

livePugCompiler.startFolder.title: Начальный путь
livePugCompiler.startFolder.description: Root path to pugs files for compilation. Default is workspace root path.
